DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FIRST ROUND ; SPOTLIGHT ; WHO ARE THEY ?
DOC.TEXT: Perhaps because the Brazilian media were still dissecting the 1-1 tie with Sweden , they asked Brazil ' s coach , Parreira , a_couple_of questions about his team ' s second-round foe , the United States . " They are much improved , technically , " he said in response to one . " They defend well and counterattack with danger. " In response to the other , about U.S. players he regards highly , he said , " The goalkeeper ( Tony Meola ) , ( Marcelo ) Balboa and the guy ( Stewart ) in front. " RANDY HARVEY
